00019 CMenuVorticon::CMenuVorticon( char menu_mode, CExeFile &ExeFile, CMap &Map, CSavedGame &SavedGame,
00020     stOption *pOption, bool &restartVideo, bool &hideobjects ) :
00021 CMenu(menu_mode, ExeFile, SavedGame,
00022  pOption, DLG_THEME_VORTICON, restartVideo),
00023 m_Map(Map),
00024 mp_InfoScene(NULL),
00025 m_hideobjects(hideobjects)
00026 {
00027  initMainMenu();
00028 }

00030 ////
00031 // Process Routines
00032 ////
00033 void CMenuVorticon::processSpecific()
00034 {
00035  // Information Mode?
00036  if(!mp_InfoScene) // show a normal menu
00037  {
00038   // Process the Menu Type logic.
00039   CMenu::process();
00040   processMainMenu();
00041  }
00042  else // InfoScene is enabled! show it instead of the menu
00043  {
00044   mp_InfoScene->process();
00045   
00046   if(mp_InfoScene->destroyed())
00047   {
00048    SAFE_DELETE(mp_InfoScene); // Destroy the InfoScene and go back to the menu!!!
00049             // Restore the old map, that was hidden behind the scene
00050    g_pInput->flushAll();
00051    g_pVideoDriver->setScrollBuffer(&m_Map.m_scrollx_buf, &m_Map.m_scrolly_buf);
00052    m_Map.drawAll();
00053    m_Map.m_animation_enabled = true;
00054    m_hideobjects = false;
00055   }
00056  }
00057 }
00058 
00059 void CMenuVorticon::processMainMenu()
00060 { 
00061  if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION)
00062  {
00063   if( m_selection == 3 ) // Show Highscores
00064   {
00065    m_hideobjects = true;
00066    m_Map.m_animation_enabled = false;
00067    mp_InfoScene = new CHighScores(m_Episode, m_GamePath, false);
00068    m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00069   }
00070  }
00071 
00072  if( g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_HELP) ) // open the help menu
00073  {
00074   m_SubMenus.push_back(new CHelpMenu(mp_InfoScene, m_dlg_theme, m_ExeFile, m_hideobjects));
00075   m_Map.m_animation_enabled = false;
00076   m_suspended = true;
00077   m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00078  }
00079 }
00080 
00081 ////
00082 // Cleanup Routines
00083 ////
00084 void CMenuVorticon::cleanup()
00085 {
00086  CMenu::cleanup();
00087  m_Map.m_animation_enabled = true;
00088 }
00089 
00090 CMenuVorticon::~CMenuVorticon()
00091 {
00092  cleanup();
00093  SAFE_DELETE(mp_InfoScene);
00094 }
